question:
With reference to the ‘Stations Cleanliness Survey Report’ submitted, consider the following statements:
  1. Eastern Central Railway zone has the cleanest stations.
  2. Jaipur Railway Station was ranked at the bottom of the list.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Statement 1 is incorrect: The Station Cleanliness Survey report listed the stations in Rajasthan to be the cleanliest in India. The survey usually covers only major urban stations. This time, even sub-urban stations have been surveyed. The stations across India have banned single use plastics. Statement 2 is incorrect: Jaipur in Rajasthan is one of the cleanliest railway stations in India according to the report. Other places in Rajasthan like Jodhpur and Durgapur were also listed at the top. The cleanliest railway zones are north western zone and the south east central zone.
